name: Black Slime FurAffinity
description: A FurAffinity style by Cooped. Updated on 2014.08.12. My personal style for FurAffinity. A black theme with soft text and subtle contrasts. I've also cleaned up several areas of FurAffinity that either cluttered quickly or introduced inconsistencies. Black Slime is a base style for many other themes which share common functionalities such as: Dynamic Updating, a News Delivery System, Dissolving Links, and much much more. Activation instructions in release notes. FA FurAffinity Black Slime Dark Cooped
